title: Why I 'Switched' From IVPN To Mullvad VPN (Sorta)
description:
After using IVPN for so long, I moved over to Tailscale/Mullvad on desktop, here's why and what it means for you! (And why I still use IVPN, Proton, & Mullvad)

Thank you to Tuta for being the first ever Techlore Gold Video Sponsor, check out their open source, privacy-respecting email service on their site: https://tutanota.com/create-email-account/?t-src=tech

Original VPN + NextDNS Video: https://youtu.be/xIXG3cFT6O4
NAS Privacy Review Video: https://youtu.be/PUGVQt2ppC0
My Browser Journey Video: https://youtu.be/1eRlAbyjKfU
